description:
Returns identifying information about the instrument and its
									firmware in Tektronix Codes and Formats notation.

									TEK/<model>,CF:91.1CT,FV:<firmware>

Returns the instrument identification code in IEEE 488.2 notation.

									TEKTRONIX,<model>,0,CF:91.1CT FV:<firmware>
Sets the RS-232 interface transmission speed.
Queries the RS-232 interface transmission speed.
Sets the state of RS232 hard flagging RTS/CTS.
Queries the state of RS232 hard flagging RTS/CTS.
Sets the state of RS232 hard flagging RTS/CTS.
Queries the state of RS232 hard flagging RTS/CTS.
